But imo, for a kit with the mobility he has, it's too much. *gasp*, lets give it "counter play", like a falcon punch, except it's a kick, but it wont be like falcon kick because it will have a falcon punch style wind up, into a kick, that hits whoever is in front of him instead of being point and click.

To be honest. Unless the lee sin is Gold+ it's really hard for him to carry a game. I'm gold 2 and I still have trouble finding a good lee in my ranked games. His kit needs some toning down, but for the most part I see why he isn't being nerfed. Riot and most people in the LCS agree he's in a good place. but Nerfing other top tier junglers and leaving him out seems odd to say the least.

If it weren't for the fact he can counter jungle so easily. I'm barely making ends meet and Lee sin finishes his side to come in, steal my buff and/or kill me. Even bought him to do the same thing. I will be honest, his kit is fun. I wouldn't take anything out he "feels" balanced. He does not however have any weakness so he feels unbalanced. The E does to much damage for my taste.
He needs to not grant true vision with his abilities too be honest.

the sight thing is the part of his kit that does make sense actually (although only he should be able to use it, not his teammates). He's a blind monk who uses sonic waves to determine where his teammates are, like a bat. What doesn't make sense is that he's also a martial arts master. his lore doesn't mention him learning kung-fu at all...

He has so much utility that fits in with the whole 'blind' thing, but his damage comes out of the blue. He should have been a support right from the start. Since it's way, way, way too late to do that now, he should at least be a utility jungler instead of a fighter, or he should at least be tanky. Giving him everything is the problem.
That makes 0 sense thematically, and mechanically. If he hits an enemy with his Q while stealthed, he just flies towards an enemy he can't even see?
to be fair, he can't see any of his enemies, even a fully stacked chogath who's ignited with all 4 of lee's teammates surrounding him.
But let's say he Q or E's why does this let him see a stealthed units gameplay wise? Why not just grant basic vision of that champ like every other vision granting ability.

Ill start off by saying yes lee isn't balanced in terms of other champions but his Q certainly makes sense as to why he can see them. First, he is blind he cant really see at all so how can he go around? using echolocation similar to a bat. No while that isn't very effective we have to think game logic as well. His q is a Sound wave so hitting an enemy apparently bounces sound off them giving him vision NOW this is where it gets thrown off because suddenly EVERYONE can see that person which is the part that makes no sense.. If only lee can see them if would be a nice touch to his Kit. Other part is Lee suddenly defies gravity dashing a really long distance and curving mid air ( yes some other champs do that but i mean come on its a game). Now his e is more of a tremor which why HE specifically needs TWO methods of being able to see stealth champions I HAVE NO IDEA. In fact no other champion in league has TWO abilities that allow them to see stealthed champions ( honestly {{champion:51}} ult doesn't count as that's during they go into stealth)
